generated_doNotEdit.title: Swim Idle Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the entity go idle, if swimming. Entity must be in water.

fields.title: Idle Time
fields.description: Amount of time (in seconds) to stay idle.

fields.title: Success Rate
fields.description: Percent chance this entity will go idle, 1.0 = 100%.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
